job.title: Lead Software Engineer - 100% remote, eCommerce website
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Human Resources
job.description: Job Description This client is a high-growth, up and coming, eCommerce platform that focuses on creating products that are good for people and good for the environment. You will be in a high impact role where your code matters and has direct impact on the end-user. The client is looking for a great Lead Engineer, Full stack with emphasis on the back end who can help build out their platform and lead a team. Role & Responsibilities From ordering to customer accounts to product catalogs and pricing and commissions, you'll work across the sets of services and functionality we provide to customers. The ideal candidate will be able to collaborate with our top-notch engineering team & product managers, and build great services and features for our customers, and then work with our highly-skilled engineers in both code reviews and architecture discussions to help drive forward a cohesive code base. Develop new backend functionality & components. Drive engineering efficiency improvements through build tooling, CI/CD pipeline improvements, architectural improvement, tech debt paydown, etc. Skills & Qualifications 6+ years' experience building robust full stack functionality. 5+ Years of Experience in T-SQL. 2+ years leading teams/projects with iterative deliverables. Cloud experience (GCP or AWS). Benefits $165-175k base salary with 10% annual bonus based on company performance. 100% remote. Full benefits. Company shuts down the week of July 4th. If you are interested in this position, please email an updated copy of your resume to s.tholen@jeffersonfrank.com.
